alert.note: Alert for Cotton (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 02 at 1:56PM CDT until June 04 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Deep Red Creek near Randlett affecting Cotton County.
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. OKC033-030700- /O.EXT.KOUN.FL.Y.0019.000000T0000Z-220604T1200Z/ /RNDO2.N.ER.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NO/ 156 PM CDT Thu Jun 2 2022 ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Deep Red Creek near Randlett. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Some inundation of bottomlands may occur along and near the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 16.4 feet. - Forecast...The Deep Red Creek is expected to rise to a crest of 18.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
